info.name: C2M API v2 - Getting Started (With Examples)
info.description:
Educational collection with realistic test data organized by usage patterns to help new users get started with the C2M API.

This collection demonstrates 16 common patterns across 3 categories:
- Most Frequently Used (3 patterns)
- Bulk Operations (3 patterns)
- Advanced Patterns (10 patterns)

All request bodies contain realistic example data (names, addresses, IDs) that can be used for immediate testing.

item.name: Most Frequently Used
item.description: The most common API calls for everyday use

description.content:
Submit a single document to one recipient using jobTemplate

Uses docSourceAll (requestId variant) and recipientAddressSource (singleAddress variant) with realistic test data
Added as a part of security scheme: bearer
Added as a part of security scheme: bearer

body.raw:
{
  "docSourceAll": {
    "url": "https://api.example.com/v1/documents/5678"
  },
  "recipientAddressSource": {
    "firstName": "John",
    "lastName": "Smith",
    "address1": "123 Main Street",
    "address2": "Apt 4B",
    "address3": "",
    "city": "New York",
    "state": "NY",
    "zip": "10001",
    "country": "USA",
    "nickName": "Johnny",
    "phoneNumber": "+1-555-123-4567"
  },
  "jobTemplate": "template_kgx7QVzO",
  "paymentDetails": {
    "achDetails": {
      "routingNumber": "021000021",
      "accountNumber": "1234567890",
      "checkDigit": 7
    }
  },
  "returnAddress": {
    "firstName": "Harrison",
    "lastName": "Schoen",
    "address1": "124 London Road",
    "city": "Bolingbrook",
    "state": "Iowa",
    "zip": "29541",
    "country": "Hungary",
    "address2": "680 Sycamore Avenue",
    "address3": "84798 Korey Mews"
  },
  "jobOptions": {
    "documentClass": "primary",
    "layout": "primary",
    "productionTime": "2026-02-16T05:52:37.499Z",
    "envelope": "default",
    "color": "default",
    "paperType": "standard",
    "printOption": "default",
    "mailClass": "standard"
  },
  "tags": [
    "<string>",
    "<string>"
  ]
}

item.name: Address capture - PDF with embedded addresses

request.name: Submit a single pdf addressCapture job

description.content:
Submit PDF where addresses are extracted from the document

No recipientAddressSource needed - addresses are captured from PDF content

Uses pdfSplitJobsNoAddress (startPage/endPage without recipientAddressSource) with realistic page ranges

item.name: Advanced Patterns
item.description: Advanced features and edge cases for complex workflows

request.name: Submit a multi doc merge job

description.content:
Combine multiple documents into one before mailing

Uses mergeDocumentSource (documentsToMerge array) with realistic document IDs
Added as a part of security scheme: bearer
Added as a part of security scheme: bearer
Added as a part of security scheme: bearer
Added as a part of security scheme: bearer

    "<integer>",

  ],
